lists.title: Asphalt Shingle Roofing in San Antonio, TX
lists.shortDescription: Durable, cost-effective asphalt shingle installation and replacement for most residential homes.
lists.description:
• Common Applications: residential roof replacements, new construction, and re-roof projects

  • Benefits:

    • Wide selection of architectural and 3-tab shingles

    • Cost-effective with strong wind and weather performance

    • Available upgrades: impact-resistant, reflective, and high-wind rated shingles
lists.h2: What Is Asphalt Shingle Roofing in San Antonio, TX
lists.p2: Asphalt shingle roofing is the most common residential roofing system in San Antonio due to its affordability, variety of styles, and proven durability. Stephanie Romo Roofing installs premium architectural and designer shingles from leading manufacturers, ensuring proper underlayment, flashing, and ventilation for long-lasting performance. Call us at [phone] to schedule a free inspection and estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a New Asphalt Shingle Roof?
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Recommended For:

    • Historic slate or clay-tile restorations where matching original materials is required

    • Structures with major underlying structural issues (we provide assessment and referrals)

What's Included:

  • Full roof inspection and written estimate

  • Tear-off or overlay options with proper underlayment

  • New flashing, drip edge, ridge vents, and debris cleanup

  • Manufacturer and workmanship warranty options

Typical Lifespan & Warranty:
15–30 years depending on shingle class and attic ventilation
Common Upgrades: Impact-resistant shingles, improved ventilation, ice & water shield where required

leftSection.title: Architectural & Designer Shingles
leftSection.description: Upgrade options for improved curb appeal, better wind resistance, and extended warranty coverage.

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Shingle
rightSection.description: Consider material grade, wind rating, color, warranty length, and energy-efficient (reflective) options. We provide samples and color-matching guidance to complement your home.

lists.comapreHeading: What To Expect During Asphalt Shingle Installation
allowedItems: Complete roof inspection and written proposal
Tear-off and disposal of existing shingles (if selected)
Proper underlayment, flashing, and ventilation installation
New ridge vent, drip edge, and water penetration barriers
Final cleanup and magnetic sweep of roof nails
prohibitedItems: Asbestos abatement or handling of hazardous roofing materials
Major structural framing replacement (we coordinate with contractors)
Interior drywall or ceiling repair beyond roof leak containment
Unpermitted work without proper inspection (we assist with permits)
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Asphalt Shingle Roofing:
idealProjects: Upgrading to impact-resistant shingles after storm damage

lists.h2: Emergency Roof Repair & Storm Damage Restoration in San Antonio, TX
lists.p2: If your roof was damaged by wind, hail, or fallen debris, Stephanie Romo Roofing offers emergency tarping and rapid repairs to prevent further interior damage. We work with insurance adjusters, provide photo documentation, and prepare scope-of-work estimates for claims. Call [phone] now for emergency assistance and same-day response when available.
lists.tyesHeading: When to Call for Emergency Roof Repair
lists.p3: Active leaks | Missing or large areas of shingle loss after a storm | Fallen trees or major structural compromise | Visible sagging or interior water stains
lists.seoContent:
Emergency Roof Repair & Storm Restoration in San Antonio, TX

Storm damage or sudden leaks require immediate attention. Stephanie Romo Roofing provides emergency tarping, temporary water intrusion control, detailed damage reports, and long-term repair or replacement solutions. Contact us at [phone] for fast, reliable service.
lists.overViewHeading: Overview Of Emergency Roof Repair Services
lists.overViewContent:
• Limitations:

    • Emergency tarping is a temporary measure; long-term repairs or replacement may be required

    • Interior restoration beyond water containment is handled by specialty contractors (we coordinate)

What's Included:

  • On-site assessment and immediate tarping (when needed)

  • Written damage report and photographic documentation for insurance

  • Temporary and permanent repair options with timelines

Response Notes:
Same-day emergency response when possible; priority scheduling after major storms
Insurance Support: We assist with documentation and adjuster meetings to streamline claims

leftSection.title: Restore vs Replace
leftSection.description: We evaluate whether a repair will restore performance or if a full replacement is the long-term solution.

rightSection.title: How to Decide Repair or Replacement
rightSection.description: Consider age of roof, extent of damage, remaining life expectancy, and insurance coverage. Our inspection gives you a clear, written recommendation.

lists.comapreHeading: Common Emergency Repairs & What We Handle
allowedItems: Gutter repairs related to roof drainage
prohibitedItems: Complete structural rebuilds beyond the roof surface (we refer licensed structural contractors)
Interior mold remediation (we coordinate with specialists)
Unauthorized work that violates local codes without proper permits
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for Emergency & Repair Services:
